name: Kan Kusakabe
introduction: Hi, I'm Kan Kusakabe, a PhD student at Hokkaido University. My research interests focus on developing interactive interfaces that enhance mobile interactions, particularly through accessory-style interfaces, advanced sensing techniques, and gesture inputs. I also explore machine learning and 3D printing to create innovative solutions that seamlessly integrate digital and physical experiences. I'm always excited to connect about research collaborations, internships, or career opportunities. Thanks for checking out my portfolio! If you wanna to contact me, please click each icon below.
